pages.text: $(li)Maggots can be used to breed $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/roadrunner)Roadrunners$(/l).$(br)$(li)They can be used to craft a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/crimson_mosquito_larva)Crimson Mosquito Larva$(/l) too.$(br)$(li)They can be obtained slaying $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/fly)Flies$(/l) or be dugging up by a $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/platypus)Platypus$(/l) that is been fed with $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/redstone)Redstone Dust$(/l) too.
